channel.title: Stochastic Dynamic Programming on A Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content in Stochastic Dynamic Programming on A Hugo website

item.title: A pipe dream
item.description: This is the first part of a two part series of blog posts on how to solve and / or optimise complex decision making elucidated using a simple hypothetical problem. Decision makers are faced with complex policy decisions where they are expected to maximise immediate utility for stakeholder value but not at the expense of future stakeholders’ interests. The effect of the current action determined through policy thus contributes to both current utility and to future utility through its effect on the future state of the system.
